Select the right plan that suites your n: Select the right plan that suites your needs and complete the registration form to get started.
Configure your preferred payment channel: Configure your preferred payment channels and business details. This will be used to customize your experience and improve relationship with customers
Your interface will be setup immediately: Your interface will be setup immediately with the most outstanding features you require.
We are now opened to new feature request: We are now opened to new feature requests. Let us know how best we can improve to suite your business. Help us make this bigger and better.
Coming on your way is android app to fur: Coming on your way is android app to further make your management activities way more easier. Anticipate!
Basically for any kind of product or ser: Basically for any kind of product or services you offer, it helps you manage your available stock and track your sales.
You are giving absolute super power in i: You are giving absolute super power in issuing and scheduling repeated invoices to customers, fully customized with your business details
This helps you get rid of any paper work: This helps you get rid of any paper work of clients and customers, and allows you to manage them every where you go.
Just in case you have an existing databa: Just in case you have an existing database of customers and invoice, we have made it easy for you to transfer it into the system using a csv data file
We have made support for your locale cur: We have made support for your locale currency and all your prices are formatted using your own currency symbol
If you are in a region where multiple ta: If you are in a region where multiple taxes applies to your different products, we have got you covered. All tax charges are stated per customer transaction.
This comes in handy whenever you wish to: This comes in handy whenever you wish to pass some information to customers. Messages are customized according to your business profile setup
Customers receives detailed information: Customers receives detailed information about invoice status and progress. So you need not bother on manual notification
A QR code is generated on each invoices: A QR code is generated on each invoices with which your customers upon scanning can pay using any of your specified payment channels, while transactions are recorded immediately.
Our carefully crafted user interface is: Our carefully crafted user interface is very pleasing to the eye. We guarantee you an awesome experiece.
Made flexible for any kind of business,: Made flexible for any kind of business, you may print out receipt on the point of sale or issue an invoice to be paid later
Comprehensive highlight, statistics and: Comprehensive highlight, statistics and charts are made available so that you can easily track your progress.
We provide you the ability to customize: We provide you the ability to customize templates to be used for customers notification and printing of receipts
Our service is the best of its kind and: Our service is the best of its kind and we are gradually evolving. We are open to feature suggestions, let us know how we can serve you better.
If you have any enquiry or complaints, o: If you have any enquiry or complaints, our online support agent is always available. We would love to hear from you.
